Name: French Bison-Tini
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Review: A French Martini with the distinctive taste of Żubrówka.
History: Riffs & variations on the French Martini with other spirits and liqueurs.
Nutrition: One serving of French Bison-Tini contains 195 calories
